name: Project Wizard [WIP]
description:
Thanks for checking out my project!

We're still in really early days here so everything is placeholder art, sfx, etc. If there are any issues with copyright/attribution, I will be replacing assets with my own work so they shouldn't stick around.

Controls:

W A S D - move

Space - switch mode

Shoot Mode:

L-click - shoot

Editor Mode:

L-click - paint tile

Shift+L-click - pick tile

Q / E - prev / next tile (0 - 7; 7 being empty)
